title: Mrs. World Saga : Complaint moved to mediation board
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Colombo Magistrate’s Court on Monday (14) ordered for the complaint filed against Former Mrs. World Caroline Jurie and model Chula Padmendra, for causing harm when forcibly removing the crown of Mrs. Sri Lanka Pushpika De Silva, to be taken up on 4th April 2022.
The complaint was taken up in the presence of the Colombo Additional Magistrate Chandima Liyanage, and Sri Lanka Police said the matter was moved to the mediation board for settlement.
The Magistrate ordered for all parties concerned to be present at the mediation board on the 4th of April.
New Zealand also in fuel crisis, says SLPP MP; Kiwi Govt slashes fuel taxes
